impression_positive: 1. Progression of disease with increase in lymphadenopathy and bilateral adrenal nodules. 2. retroperitoneal edema , new small left effusion and new small-volume ascites. Soft tissue thickening along the undersurface of the left diaphragm is stable from the recent exam but increased from older studies and suspicious for peritoneal tumor. 3. Increase in subtle sclerosis in the superior half of the L2 vertebral body suspicious for metastasis
